title: New: Kanzi – Part 1
content:
Impressing us, and Alt-J (well Alt-J started following them on Soundcloud…) with their debut track, Water, Brighton’s Kanzi have followed it up with Part 1.

Centred around a killer hook, and relying more on the ‘slick’ production than their previous effort, it’s further proof that they have the potential to be rather special. Check out Part 1 below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
